description.value: Choose two of the following formulas: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ZR1TnC34ohP5nROX]{Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Item[Lesser Bullheaded Mutagen, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zrcJMKdwxSKxxLEG]{Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.iDgo3OfnikwNGyfo]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ChFYb3A94KNByRui]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.5fnEOtROEy2hkzDG]{Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)}.
